doc.title: Ultima II: Revenge of the Enchantress
doc.plot: In this game, you travel into the past to stop Mondain's student, Minax the Enchantress. She has worked in the background to sew hatred and discord until, in 2111, a great holocaust occured. Only a few men still stand together and they have requested your help. Destroy Minax so that the world that is will become the world it could have been.
